---
id: update-canonical-url
title: "更新规范 URL"
description: "设置或取消部署的 convex.cloud 规范 URL"

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"更新规范 URL"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/update_canonical_url"} context={"endpoint"} />

为某个部署的 convex.cloud 或 convex.site 域名设置或取消规范 URL。这样你就可以在部署中自定义 CONVEX&#95;SITE&#95;URL 和
CONVEX&#95;CLOUD&#95;URL 环境变量。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"请求"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined} />

<RequestSchema title={"请求体"} body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["requestDestination"],"properties":{"requestDestination":{"description":"是否更新 convex.cloud 或 convex.site 的规范 URL","type":"string","enum":["convexCloud","convexSite"],"title":"RequestDestination"},"url":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"新的规范 URL。省略该字段可将规范 URL 重置为\n默认值。"}},"title":"UpdateCanonicalUrlRequest"}}},"required":true}} />

<StatusCodes id={undefined} label={undefined} responses={{"200":{"description":""}}} />
